subject: Contract Agreements (EPC Works)/ Concessino Agreeemnts (BOT/ Annuity Projects)/ Consultancy Agreements for Feasibility Study & DPR/ Supervision Consultancy and Agreements for Independent Consultancy Services- Authorized Representative of Employer (NHAI)
text: HRdfv <cfl TTHT gfearot TH1Y Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (3m @aat 3 7TH #ATT4) 44 /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 MT National Highways Authority of India Q. Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0-5 & 6, #re<-10, ERrAT, 7 faorit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn: 6th  June 2011 POLICY MATTER 1 Technical (79/2011) (Decision taken in Item No.10 of 74th meeting of the Executive Committee held on 9.5.2011) Sub: Contract Agreements (EPC Works) Concession Agreements (BOT/ Annuity Projects) / Consultancy Agreements for Feasibility Study & DPR Supervision Consultancy and Agreements for Independent Consultancy Services Authorized Representative of Employer (NHAI): Executive Committee in its 74th meeting held on 09.05.2011 decided that General Manager posted at RO Office and where GM is not posted in RO offices, CGMRO may be declared as NHAI's Authorized Representative for all the contracts under implementation to be implemented in that State and all the concerned contractors concessionaires and consultants may be informed  accordingly: Any notices as an Authorized Representative on behalf of NHAI may be issued by GM with the approval of CGM/RO: However, if CGM feels that the notice is having larger implications ramifications and requires approval of Member Chairman, he may forward the draft notice to HQ for specific approval: 2. The above decision of the Executive Committee is   circulated for information and necessary action: surlo (M: Chandrashekhar) GM (Coord:) To All CGMs at Hqs. AII GMs/DGMs Managers at AIlI ROs EDs All PDs Lib Hindi Officer Copy to: All Members / CVO PS to Chairman 7 ?1  NHAL Hqs.
